医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究发现，青春期较高的BMI会使高血压的遗传风险恶化。青春期BMI扩大了高血压的遗传风险，BMI在成年期修饰SBP的易感性方面存在性别特定的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/Higher-BMI-in-adolescence-worsens-genetic-risk-for-high-blood-pressure-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/higher-bmi-bmi-in--------------------------------------------------------------------------- comments.aspx#comments.aspx#comments.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=800AC836-95BC-43F4-99F7-C4AD4AD4AD2894A Mon, 17 Mar 2025 21:19:00 -0400 Higher BMI in adolescence worsens genetic risk for high blood pressure, study finds
隧穿纳米管状结构发现在心脏形成中起着至关重要的作用副教授Mingfu Wu在他在休斯顿大学药物发现研究所的实验室中，通过分享他对子宫内心脏形成方式的基本过程，为治疗心脏病提供了新的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/tunneling-nanotube-like-structures-found-to-play-play-a-critical-clitical-role-in-heart-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/tunneling-nanotube-like-structures-found-to-play-play-a-critical-critical-role-in-heart formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c09da81-78b5-40fa-8b58-9e6126067a44 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 20:38:18 -0400 Tunneling Nanotube-Like Structures found to play a critical role in heart formation
研究揭示了压力如何以性别依赖性方式影响TBI的结果压力如何影响创伤性脑损伤（TBI）的行为结果是知识的主要差距https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/study-reveals-how-now-stress-aftects-tbi-comes-in-a-a-sex-sex dippedent-manner.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/study-reveals-how-stress-aftects-tbi-comes--in-a-a-sex-sex dipendent-manner.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E970AC1-8B92-4B45-AC73-C4D55D55D13D5E5 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 20:33:00 -0400 Study reveals how stress affects TBI outcomes in a sex-dependent manner
授予217万美元的NIH赠款，以调查针对脑损伤恢复的颅骨疗法操纵对头部施加一点压力是否可以成为治疗创伤性脑损伤的游戏规则改变者？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/24217-million-nih-nih-grant-awarded to-investigate-cranial-cranial-osteopathic-manipation-manipulation-for-brain-brain-brain-injury-injury-injury-injury-injury-injury-injury-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/24217-Million-NIH-Grant-award-wart-to-investigate-cranial-cranial-osteopathic-manipulation-manipulation-manipulation-for-brain-brain-injury-injury-injury-injury-injury-injury-injury-injury-injory-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5423524A-33F8-4F5B-92C1-34686F72EE91 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 20:29:11 -0400 $2.17 million NIH grant awarded to investigate cranial osteopathic manipulation for brain injury recovery
益生菌饮料开菲尔显示出预防阿尔茨海默氏症的希望开菲尔是一种富含益生菌的发酵牛奶，在减少神经炎症，氧化应激和β-淀粉样蛋白的堆积方面可能表明在阿尔茨海默氏症的预防和管理中发挥了作用。但是，需要更多的临床试验来确认其在人类患者中的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/probiotic-drink-kefir-shows-shows-promise-in-promise-in-promise-in-promise-inpeventing-alzheimere28099s.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/probiotic-drink-kefir-shows-shows-promise-in-promise-in-promise-in-promise-inpeventing-alzheimere28099s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43684675-164b-4f5a-b2ee-b2ee-b2ee-b2ee-b2ee-b6b8acd6ba8d Mon, 17 Mar 2025 20:27:00 -0400 Probiotic drink kefir shows promise in preventing Alzheimer’s
对ADAR1机制的新见解可以彻底改变自身免疫和癌症疗法由赖斯大学的杨高（Yang Gao）领导的研究团队发现了对ADAR1分子机制的新见解，ADAR1的分子机制是一种调节核糖核酸（RNA）诱导的免疫反应的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/new-insights-into-into-adar1-mechanisms-could-revolutions-could-revolutions-autoimmune-andommune-and-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/new-insights-into-into-adar1-mechanisms-could-revolutions-could-revolutions-autoimmune-and-cancer-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e2ec040-d10d-418e-af2f-e25537466913 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 20:24:32 -0400 New insights into ADAR1 mechanisms could revolutionize autoimmune and cancer therapies
研究将产后抑郁症与儿童的情绪暴饮暴食联系起来多达25％的新妈妈患有产后抑郁症，这会严重影响其育儿行为和孩子的福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/study-links-maternal-postpartm-depression-to-ymotional-erotional-overeating-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/study-links-maternal-postpartm-departm-depression-to-ymotional-erotional-eroteating-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=809AD910-F0A7-47EC-B4CC-B4CC-BEC350CDC9EB Mon, 17 Mar 2025 20:11:24 -0400 Study links maternal postpartum depression to emotional overeating in children
饮食中的一点香料可以防止妊娠糖尿病吗？怀孕期间每月吃一次辣椒与妊娠糖尿病的风险明显降低，而干豆类和豆类汤没有明显的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/could-a-little-pice-spice-in-your-diet-prevent-prevent-gestational-daibetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/could-a-little-spice-spice-in-your-diet-prevent-prevent-gestational-daibettation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdf94f1f-bd5f-454f-454f-8f-8f0f-37c8e3e1c20d Mon, 17 Mar 2025 20:00:00 -0400 Could a little spice in your diet prevent gestational diabetes?
通过机器学习预测青少年的艾滋病毒治疗不遵守在撒哈拉以南非洲，有170万艾滋病毒的青少年中，有近85％的人以及世界上近4000万人中有一半居住在艾滋病毒中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/predicting-hiv-treatment-nonadherence-in-adecents-in-adecents-in-with-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/predicting-hiv-treatment-nonadherence-in-adecents-in-Adecents-with-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A2BBBACA-4628-4471-BACE-006D118D9F0C Mon, 17 Mar 2025 19:50:00 -0400 Predicting HIV treatment nonadherence in adolescents with machine learning
NKD2蛋白发现为打击骨骼损失打开了新的可能性一项变革性的研究发现了蛋白质裸角质同源物2（NKD2）在调节骨形成成骨成骨细胞和骨折的破骨细胞中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/nkd2-protein-discovery-opens-up-new-possibilities-in-the-the-the-the-the-fight-against-bone-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/nkd2-protein-discovery-opens-up-new-possibilities-in-the-the-the-fight-fight-against-bone-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54411A8D-3A55-4E95-A3F7-A3F7-321349032CFF Mon, 17 Mar 2025 19:39:18 -0400 NKD2 protein discovery opens up new possibilities in the fight against bone loss
